name: Fab Salon
description:
Are you bored of the regular hairstyles? Then you have come to the right place.
Welcome to the Fab Salon where you can create a magical transformation of the characters with some cool hairstyles. Play with different hair lengths, colors and textures as you play this amazing game. Get your characters ready for each occasion with just the right look that they desired!
Accidentally chopped off more hair? Relax; the hair growing solution is at your rescue!
So are you ready to give a makeover?
Features:
*Five different characters
*Different hair textures like straight, wavy, spiky & curly
*Cool tools like scissor, blower, hair iron, trimmer, curler & 12 funky hair colors
*Hair growth solution
*44 styles to play with
*Earn daily bonus coins

As these apps are free, they may contain third party
advertisements.
